Context: The text mentions that George Brown College is committed to sustainability and reducing its eco-footprint through various initiatives such as sustainability-driven procurement process, energy retrofits and conservation practices, and zero waste strategies. This commitment is reflected in their Vision 2030 and Sustainability Plan 2022. The Sustainability Plan has three overarching goals. To learn more about the college's Energy Conservation and Demand Management Plan, as well as the Sustainability 2022 plan, reports can be downloaded from the website. The college also encourages signing up for updates on application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, etc. Contact information provided is 416-415-2000 and TTY: 1-877-515-5559 with an email address of ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The website contains information that is subject to change without notice.
